articles.description: We thank Sebi for reposing its faith in BSE to operate as a KYC Registration Agency. KYC KRA has become a key segment for securities market investors and acts as a starting point for any investor's journey in the securities market.
articles.content: New Delhi:BSE Technologies, a subsidiary of BSE, has received authorisation from capital markets regulator Sebi to act as a KYC Registration Agency (KRA). KRA is a Sebi-regulated intermediary that gr… [+1452 chars]

articles.title: Talentedge's owner takes stake in upGrad at $2 billion value after integration - Economic Times
articles.description: Talentedge was valued at Rs 205 crore and the near 100% share swap transaction was done at an upGrad value of $2 billion.

articles.author: Kritti Bhalla
articles.title: Gautam Adani is now the sixth richest person in the world - Business Insider India
articles.description: Gautam Adani, the founder and chairperson of the Adani Group, is now the sixth richest person in the world. He has surpassed Oracle’s Larry Ellison and Google’s Sergey Brin and Larry Page to reach the spot.
